Class KmePeerConnectionControllerImpl

  • com.kme.kaltura.kmesdk.controller.impl.KmePeerConnectionControllerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IKmePeerConnectionController, IKmePeerConnectionEvents

    public class KmePeerConnectionControllerImpl
implements IKmePeerConnectionController, IKmePeerConnectionEvents

    An implementation for p2p connection
